thread.title: LegalNature Pro Integrates Clio Document Automation
thread.title_full: LegalNature Pro Integrates with Clio for Document Automation

author: Cathy Kenton
title: LegalNature Pro Integrates Clio Document Automation
text:
LegalNature , LLC, a leading provider of online legal and business documents, today announced that LegalNature Pro , its document automation platform designed specifically to meet the needs of law firms, is now integrated with Clio, the leading cloud-based law practice management platform. The integration enables lawyers and their staff to quickly and efficiently automate critical client forms and connect them to client matters in Clio. The company will be demonstrating both the application and integration at the Clio Cloud Conference , October 19-20, 2015 in Chicago, IL. LegalNature Pro includes a wide variety of business, real estate, family law, and estate planning documents. The intuitive web-based interface makes data entry and document assembly efficient for lawyers. In addition, subscribers have customization capabilities that allow them to include additional content often required in professional documents. The documents have been developed by licensed attorneys and customized to meet specific state requirements.
“Attorneys and their staff members want the ability to automate documents in a cost-effective manner,” said Corey Bray, LegalNature’s founder and CEO. “LegalNature Pro’s integration with Clio allows our mutual clients to quickly produce, access, and store client documents.”
“Clio is committed to simplifying law firm’s day-to-day operations. With so much of a law firm’s workflow focusing on quickly and accurately producing professional documents, the Clio and LegalNature Pro integration represents another way we help lawyers streamline the way they work,” said Jack Newton, CEO and co-founder of Clio.
LegalNature documents focus on the needs of business professionals. Since early 2014, LegalNature has served over 450,000 users. Legal and business document downloads in 2015 continue to increase significantly month-over-month, and have already exceeded 650,000 documents generated in the United States and the United Kingdom since the first of the year.
About LegalNature:
LegalNature, founded in 2011, helps business and individuals simplify their legal needs by offering legal documents that are effortless to create and manage. The sophisticated form building technology at the heart of LegalNature offers step-by-step guidance to help users create venue specific documents for its customers in the U.S. and the U.K. For more information, visit LegalNature.com .
About Clio:
Clio is the most comprehensive cloud-based practice management platform for the legal industry. With the help of the cloud, Clio eases the process of time tracking, billing, administration, and collaboration for law firms of all sizes. Based in Vancouver, B.C. and launched in 2008, Clio is used by legal professionals in over 50 countries. Clio has raised $27 million from investors including Bessemer Venture Partners. For more information, visit goClio.com
